channel.title: DudeWithJetpack
channel.description:
It may not be much, but I'm still posting it!
This is just another space-invader like game.
What's special about it? You play the game on your computer but control it through an android phone over the internet!
Goal? [s]Make it into a 4-player game and do something about the graphics when I have the time.[/s] (completed) New goal (01/10/14): create a game-platform with small games like this one, all controlled by the same android-controller.
Release 28/09/14 [spoiler] Computer-sided [youtube]QZRsehXPPMQ[/youtube]
Android-sided (Temporary UI to control your character) [img]http://oi57.tinypic.com/16bj8s5.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
Release 29/09/14 [spoiler] Updates: *changed sizes *enemies can shoot *health system *score system *clouds and explosions *power-ups may drop from enemies
Computer-sided [youtube]7EKX2uKYzGc[/youtube] [/spoiler]
Release 29/09/14 (newest) [spoiler] Update: turned it into a multiplayer game! In the following run there are only 2 players. More players can be in a game though.
Server [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/ajms1e.jpg[/img]
Android (before gameplay) [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/9pv1hl.jpg[/img] (at gameplay) [img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/8wmp6r.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: DudeWithJetpack
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Eyeownyew, post:3, topic:546999”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=665898.msg4451702#msg4451702 date=1411947437]
It’s neat, but if you’re going to make phone-sided controls at least make good ones, make it feel like an actual controller not a remote.
[/quote]
he said it was temporary?[/quote]

Read full topic

It may not be much, but I’m still posting it!

This is just another space-invader like game.

What’s special about it?
You play the game on your computer but control it through an android phone over the internet!

Goal?
Make it into a 4-player game and do something about the graphics when I have the time. (completed)
